name: Инженер-программист/Software Development Engineer
description:
We are looking for highly motivated energetic software engineers with expertise in software and/or algorithm development.

Job Duties

  • Research and optimization of advanced algorithms for next generation computational lithography (OPC) and resolution enhancement techniques
  • Conduct experiments and analyze large data to measure and improve performance of algorithms by incorporating accurate heuristics
  • Design, develop and optimize complete software systems using scientific analysis
  • Modify existing software to correct critical errors in real customer designs
  • Focus on designing parallel algorithms to speed up computation
  • Interact with other teams like marketing and customer support to obtain information on functional requirements and priorities for new features
  • Interact with team leads and other engineers to obtain information on project limitations and capabilities, performance requirements and interfaces
  • Conceptualize projects and functional specifications based on feasibility of design within time and cost constraints
  • Interact with QA to develop feature specific testing and validation procedures to ensure quality of results

Job Qualifications

Masters/Bachelors in CS/EE with a minimum of 2 years of software development experience.

Required Knowledge and Skills:

  • Strong background in algorithms and data structures, mathematics, statistics and data analysis
  • Experience in developing high performance software in C/C++ using object oriented programming
  • Expertise in various software development tools like debuggers (gdb), version management (CVS), software quality enhancement tools (valgrind, purify, quantify) etc
  • Experience with developing high performance multi-threaded and distributed software is a plus.
  • Experience in research and development of various EDA/CAD tools and methodologies is big plus
  • Knowledge of lithographic process, RET, DFM/MFD is a big plus
  • Experience with Calibre SVRF for DRC is a strong plus
  • Experience with scripting languages (Shell, Perl, Python or TCL)
  • Linux advanced user experience.
